component.name: ThemedBusySpinner
component.script:
Sub Init()
print "ThemedBusySpinner:Init"
m.top.poster.uri = "pkg:/images/spinner.png"
scene = m.top.getScene() themeChangeNotifier = scene.findNode("themeChangeNotifier") themeChangeNotifier.observeFieldScoped("title", "ThemeChanged")
End Sub
Sub ThemeChanged()
print "ThemedBusySpinner:ThemeChanged"
m.top.poster.blendColor = m.global.theme.primary
End Sub
